from collections import Counter

s = input().strip()
t = input().strip()

s_counter = Counter(s)
t_counter = Counter(t)

if s_counter == t_counter:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

from collections import Counter

s = input()
t = input()
s_counter = Counter(s)
t_counter = Counter(t)
if s_counter == t_counter:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
import sys


s = sys.stdin.readline()
t = sys.stdin.readline()

if len(s) != len(t):
    print("No")
    exit()

s_list = list(s)
t_list = list(t)

s_list.sort()
t_list.sort()

if s_list == t_list:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
